definition: to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to disguise oneself as/to dress up/to play (a role)/to put on (an expression)

sentences.english: Just as fashions come and go, standards for appropriate dress continue to change.
sentences.chinese: 正如时尚的此起彼伏，穿着打扮的标准也一直在改变。

sentences.english: See via again foppery, cannot compare with oneself extra.
sentences.chinese: 再看穿着打扮，更是不及自己。

sentences.english: I've noticed that people here dress in a very interesting way.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到，这里人们的穿着打扮的确很有意思。

sentences.english: People look like pirates, so it's fun.
sentences.chinese: 里面的人穿着打扮成海盗的样子，很有趣。

sentences.english: Her every word, move, bite, gesture, dress and shoe has been analysed and second-guessed.
sentences.chinese: 她的言行举止和穿着打扮都成为人们分析评论的对象。

sentences.english: Dressing well is a priority in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 穿着打扮在意大利很重要。

sentences.english: He does not like our dress.
sentences.chinese: 他不喜欢咱们的穿着打扮。
她在穿着打扮上从不赶时髦。

definition: to decorate/to dress/to make up/to adorn/manner of dressing/style of dress
to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to disguise oneself
to apply makeup conspicuously (idiom)/dressed to the nines and wearing makeup
